mapper.select: SELECT a.BUYER_ID AS buyerId , a.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode , a.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode , a.BREED_CODE AS breedCode , a.SALE_NAME AS breedName , a.IS_STANDARD AS isStandard , (CASE WHEN COUNT(b.CATEGORY_ID) = 0 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END) AS researchStatus FROM by_research_category a LEFT JOIN by_research_cat_detail b ON b.CATEGORY_ID = a.CATEGORY_ID WHERE a.BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId} AND a.CLASSES_CODE = #{filterMap.classesCode} AND a.MACHINING_CODE = #{filterMap.machiningCode} AND a.IS_STANDARD = '0' AND a.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY a.BUYER_ID , a.CLASSES_CODE , a.MACHINING_CODE , a.BREED_CODE , a.SALE_NAME , a.IS_STANDARD
